entry.title: Statistical Inference for Data Analysts. An Introduction
entry.summary:
Description

#2 PyData Warsaw

At the end of your analysis process always lies a question of significance of your findings. You need to show that the obtained results are due to some intrinsic properties and not caused be random noise. In this talk I will show how we can test for significance in some basic situations, and how Python and SciPy module can help us with this task.
